definition: class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once
warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]

sentences.english: The isosteric heats of adsorption were determined from the isotherms and the factors that influence their variations were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 從等溫線確定了等量吸附熱並討論了其影響因素。

sentences.english: Isothermal chamber is a new kind of measuring installment used to test pneumatic component flow rate characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 等溫容器是一種新型氣動元件流量特性測量裝置。

sentences.english: of the night what you say, isothermal process, what do you say?
Reference Channel. On a thermocouple scanner card, the channel that measures the temperature of the isothermal block.
sentences.chinese: 參考通道在熱電偶掃描卡上，測量等溫塊溫度的通道。

sentences.english: Anisotropy of isothermal remanent magnetism is a recently developed technique for rock fabric study.
sentences.chinese: 等溫剩磁各向異性是一種新的磁組構研究方法。

sentences.english: The path of crack initiation and growth is transgranular under conditions of isothermal low cycle fatigue.
sentences.chinese: 在等溫低周疲勞載荷下，裂紋主要爲穿晶萌生與擴展。

sentences.english: The related theory of adsorptive isotherm was studied about columniation layer analyse in the last of thesis.
sentences.chinese: 論文最後對柱層析的有關吸附等溫線理論進行了探討。

sentences.english: The improvement of the conventional isothermal annealing was also explored in this article.
sentences.chinese: 文章對傳統等溫球化退火工藝進行了改進。

sentences.english: The hypothetical isotherm pattern can be observed around the arctic region.
sentences.chinese: 假設的等溫線模式可以在北極周圍觀測到。

sentences.english: For uniform temperature surface, the CHF increases with the subcooling.
sentences.chinese: 對等溫面，CHF隨過冷度的增加而增加。

sentences.english: The software for analysing the sorption and desorption isotherm of paddy was presented.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了所研製的稻穀吸附與解吸等溫線性能分析軟件。

sentences.english: So here's path A, it's isothermal.
sentences.chinese: 那麼這是路徑A，它是等溫的。

sentences.english: Non-isothermal thermal decomposition kinetics of mancozeb was studied by thermogravimetry.
sentences.chinese: 用非等溫熱重法研究了代森錳鋅的熱分解反應動力學。

sentences.english: The pore distribution of sponge palladium was investigated by using BJH equation.
sentences.chinese: 採用BJH方程對吸附等溫線進行孔徑分佈規律研究。

sentences.english: We can have a different isothermal step.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個不同的等溫過程。

definition: to warm oneself/to expel the cold (TCM)
black-boned chicken/silky fowl/silkie/Gallus gallus domesticus Brisson
to take a tonic or nourishing food to build up one's health
medicinal dietary supplement that helps build up one's health
Gorgon fruit/Semen euryales (botany)/see also 芡實|芡实[qian4 shi2]
to course the liver and rectify 氣|气[qi4] (TCM)
